patthana22.17:1.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana22.17:1.1_1: hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
patthana22.17:1.1_2: paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya
patthana22.17:1.1_3: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana22.17:2.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:3.1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:4.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuñca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
patthana22.17:4.1_1: nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
patthana22.17:4.1_2: … tīṇi. (Dutiyaṁ gaṇitakena tīṇi.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… vipāke cuddasa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.17:5.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.17:6.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Dve pañhāyeva.)
patthana22.17:7.1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
